decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of the original permission 00244/30A/P9 dated 04/03/2015.

Condition : 2 - Development shall be carried out in accordance with the detailed samples of the material approved under planning application reference 00244/30A/P9(2,4,5,7,8) dated 01/07/2016, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (A01 received 16/04/2015. 869.SK10a received 15/05/2015. Internal Space Schedule 869 received 19/05/2015. 869 005E received 15/05/2016 (except where superseded by 2235/CON3/2 Rev A received 12/06/2017, and 2235/CON3/1 Rev A, 2235/CON3/3 Rev A, and 2235/CON3/4 Rev A received 13/06/2017)) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The Sustainable Drainage Scheme shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under planning application reference 00244/30A/P9(2,4,5,7,8) dated 01/07/2016, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The scheme for reducing carbon emissions from the total energy needs (heat, cooling and power) of the development by at least 25%, by the on-site generation of renewable energy, shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under planning application reference 00244/30A/P9(2,4,5,7,8) dated 01/07/2016, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order) no enlargement of the premises or any additional structures/buildings within the curtilage of the site shall be carried out.

Condition : 7 - The waste and recycled materials storage arrangements approved under planning application reference 00244/30A/P9(2,4,5,7,8) dated 01/07/2016, shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 8 - All hard and soft landscape works shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under planning application reference 00244/30A/P9(2,4,5,7,8) dated 01/07/2016, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The works shall be carried out prior to the occupation of the development.
description: Variation of approved plans (condition 3) to allow alterations to the windows of planning permission 00244/30A/P9 approved 04/03/2015 for erection of a three-bedroomed house with a basement including a lightwell to the front.
